publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1238.2 Rhona Brankin: Importance of Scottish History in the School Curriculumâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1238) in the name of Maureen Watt, insert at end "further recognises that without basic literacy and numeracy skills young people have difficulty accessing the curriculum, including history, and calls on the Scottish Government to provide leadership to tackle literacy and numeracy in Scottish schools which will facilitate an improved understanding of history."
